justification: Misreads Team B’s preferences: calls Nick Torres “stable” despite deep-threat variance, and assumes B doesn’t value stashing an injured dual-threat QB with a good playoff schedule. Minimal separation of A vs. B incentives. The trade is feasible, but A’s stated goal of “consolidating” conflicts with giving up a Tier 1 WR for an Out/Tier 5 QB. Rationale is generic and not grounded in roster/context.
